/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the setting sun. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the urban landscape below. Cars and pedestrians animate the scene, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The image is bathed in the soft light of dusk, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
